description:
A secret weapon for belaying in the cold or pushing the rating of your sleeping bag. The unique design of the Ninjaclava allows it to be warn as a hat or neck warmer when you don't need full face coverage.

  • Made of 37% nylon face, backed with 60% polyester, 3% spandex 100-weight Motion Fleece®
  • Smooth face fabric sheds snow; brushed interior wicks warmth and provides breathability
  • Silicone print around eye opening keeps goggles in place
  • Flat-locked seams are comfortable under a helmet
  • Hood hinges back so it can be worn as a balaclava, a neck warmer, or a beanie
name: Outdoor Research Alpine Fleece Balaclava - Unisex
